title: some los angeles apartments
content:
Hi. I try to identify the typography used by Ruscha for its "some los angeles apartments" book ; more precisely, the font used to draw the cover of this book (see reached picture). thank you beforehand for your help, anne-val√©rie.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110401102742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/31309_3926.jpg)
author: gasc

comments.content: Ruscha did a lot of hand lettering, but this could be based on [Stymie](http://web.archive.org/web/20110401102742/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/stymie_com_black/?sample_text=SOME%20LOS%20ANGELES).
thank you for this so quick answer. I'm going to look at this typography. if it is not the good one, this information put me at least on the good way ! thank you very much.
